sections.name: Sodden Sentinel
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

link.name: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 32
link.alt: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 32

link.name: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 32
link.alt: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 32

traits.name: Rare
traits.text: This rarity indicates that a rules element is very difficult to find in the game world. A rare feat, spell, item or the like is available to players only if the GM decides to include it in the game, typically through discovery during play. Creatures with this trait are rare. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creatures is increased by 5.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with negative energy and soul-corrupting evil magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by positive energy, are healed by negative energy, and don't benefit from healing effects.

link.name: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 32
link.alt: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 32

interaction_abilities.name: Slow
interaction_abilities.text: A sodden sentinel is permanently slowed 1 and can't use reactions.

universal_monster_ability.name: Negative Healing
universal_monster_ability.text: A creature with negative healing draws health from negative energy rather than positive energy. It is damaged by positive damage and is not healed by positive healing effects. It does not take negative damage, and it is healed by negative effects that heal undead.

automatic_abilities.name: Tainted Guts
automatic_abilities.text: When a sodden sentinel is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it explodes, dealing 6d6 bludgeoning damage to each creature in a 10-foot emanation (DC 30 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails this save is also blinded for 1d4 rounds (1 minute on a critical failure).

ability.name: Pummel the Fallen
ability.text: A sodden sentinel's fist Strike deals an additional 2d6 damage to prone creatures.

ability.name: Seawater Retch

traits.name: Necromancy
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

traits.name: Occult
traits.text: This magic comes from the occult tradition, calling upon bizarre and ephemeral mysteries. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Water
traits.text: Effects with the water trait either manipulate or conjure water. Those that manipulate water have no effect in an area without water. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of water or have a magical connection to the element. Planes with this trait are mostly liquid, perhaps with pockets of breathable air.

ability.text: The sodden sentinel vomits up a supernaturally tainted wave of seawater in a 30-foot cone. Each living creature in the area takes 6d10 negative damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save). It can't use Seawater Retch again for 1d4 rounds.
